fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- But First: Select two players at night. Tomorrow, if both players are alive, only those two players may be voted for whatsoever. Infinite uses, once per night.
- Rig: Select a player. They receive 2 anonymous votes instantly. These votes do not count as being from you.
- Evict: Attack a player at night, dealing a basic attack to them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get two players hanged while being affected by "But First".
